name: Hair Shave Salon makeover Kids Games Girls & Boys
name_original: Hair Shave Salon makeover Kids Games Girls & Boys
description:
***The big day has been arrived! You need to glam up yourself ! Hey kids can you help the boy to cut hair and shave?

Oh wow! Super girl to ready to glam her self ! Get her leg waxed and choose a perfect outfit! Help out a boy to choose a beautiful bucket of flower for her love!

Play & Download "Hair Shave Salon makeover Kids Games Girls & Boys" in the app store! A wonderful package of shave, hair cut, dress up and perfect outfit.

Experience overcome challenges on the way, help to cut the hair and glam up with unique style, shaving will give you a perfect look. It's will be a Crazy First Love Date that you will never forget anymore. Join it today!!!

Game Features!
- Time to shave the beard before your first date! Go to the Barber Shop
- Amazing levels to play
- Get the waxed of girl's leg! Do it Hurry up, her boyfriend is coming to pick her
- Create your own fashion and choose a perfect outfit
- Amazing flower banquet to choose from
- A boy is looking handsome after shaving! Wow girl has a wonderful look! Ready to go out
- Finally a boy proposed a girl! Super FUN!

****Barber shop~~~~ Wonderful****Have Fun~~~~
